alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 3:30PM CDT until April 17 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Prairie County in central Arkansas... East central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barrettsville, or 8 miles northwest of Hazen, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Brinkley... Des Arc... Hazen... Carlisle... Fredonia... Barrettsville... Prairie Center... Hallsville... Cotton Plant... Fargo... Becton... Screeton... Dixie... Sand Hill... Brasfield... Childers... Dagmar WMA... Little Dixie... Center Point... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 182 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
